text: Rihanna had a lot of celebrating to do after taking home a Grammy for Best Rap / Sung Performance for her collaboration with Kendrick Lamar on their song “ Loyalty. ” And to toast her win, the Fenty Puma designer kicked off at the festivities at 1 Oak club in New York last night with her rumored boyfriend, Saudi businessman Hassan Jameel. The 29 - year - old artist was spotted leaving the Grammys after - party after reportedly staying out with Jameel until close to 4 a. m. RiRi was still clad in her third glamorous ensemble for the night, which included a gold crop top that tied in the front and a long black semisheer printed skirt featuring metallic accents.
